publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-22.1 Fiona McLeod: As an amendment to motion S1M-22 in the name of Tommy Sheridan (State of Scotland Audit) at end insert: "and further that the data in the audit be disaggregated by age, gender, ethnicity and race, disability, sexuality and sexual orientation and by local authority area." Supported by: Michael Matheson
